## Recent News

<table id="rss-table" class="display" style="width:100%">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Title</th>
      <th>Published</th>
      <th>Link</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
</table>

<script>
$(document).ready(function () {
  fetch("/news_feed.json")
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(data => {
      $('#rss-table').DataTable({
        data: data,
        columns: [
          { data: 'title' },
          { 
            data: 'published',
            render: function(data) {
              return new Date(data).toLocaleString();
            }
          },
          { 
            data: 'link',
            render: function(data) {
              return `<a href="${data}" target="_blank">View</a>`;
            }
          }
        ],
        order: [[1, 'desc']],
        pageLength: 10
      });
    });
});
</script>
